page.title: 08Religion
page.content: The Reverend McKae, Rector of the Parish of St. Peter, came into school to talk about his duties and responsibilities. There are nine churches in the village of Lymm.The Reverend visits the old people who cannot visit the church,and will even give a short communion if asked.The church hall is used for playgroups, mothers and toddlers and even yoga.The Rectors other jobs are to make sure all the buildings he uses are intact and usable.The churches regular attendance on a Sunday is around one hundred, of all ages. A free bus service is provided by an ex-member of the congregation. Mr. McKae has lived in Lymm for about five years.Lymm is in the{Diocese of Chester.}Most of the Church leaders in Lymm meet together once a month informally to plan joint projects.
